thread.title: Dubai: Sky dive & ride on quad bikes in the land of thrill
thread.title_full: Dubai: Sky dive & ride on quad bikes in the land of thrill

title: Dubai: Sky dive & ride on quad bikes in the land of thrill
text: SAND ADVENTURES Region: Dubai Show off those mad driving skills in a four wheel drive vehicle as you take on the dunes of the Arabian Desert in Dubai. Away from the towering glass skyscrapers and manicured gardens of the city, the wild desert is the ideal place to let loose and pave your own path. ATVs and quad bikes are available for hire from various adventure companies. Take your family for a day-long trip with dinner served around a bonfire. From the heat of the day, experience the temperatures take a nose dive as the sun sets into the horizon. Sand skiing and kite boarding are also great sports to try while in the desert. Visiting the coastal area is a treat in itself, but how about enjoying the view from hundreds of meters in the air, while hurtling towards the ground at a speed of 200kms per hour? The last thing your going to notice is the beauty of the landscape as you free fall from an airplane. But once that parachute is pulled open, sailing above this region of metropolitan Dubai is sure to have you speechless. Various certified sky diving schools in the Jumeirah region offers courses and tandem dive offers. Book your slice of adventure in advance. VANTAGE POINT: Sky diving offers you the opportunity to get a unique glimpse of Dubai city. Strap on that parachute and take the leap! (Image: © O.Furrer/F1 Online/Corbis) KICK UP SOME DUST! Try taking on the dunes in an ATV. (Image: © Paul Souders/Corbis)
